panels.description: Paris latest overall AQ status with worst pollutant.

targets.rawSql:
WITH filtered AS (
  SELECT
    city,
    window_start,
    window_duration,
    parameter,
    rolling_avg,
    status
  FROM air_quality_metrics
  WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
    AND city = 'Paris'
    AND parameter ~* '${parameter:regex}'
    AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
    AND status ~* '${status:regex}'
), latest_ts AS (
  SELECT MAX(window_start) AS ts
  FROM filtered
), ranked AS (
  SELECT
    f.city,
    f.window_start,
    f.window_duration,
    f.status AS worst_status_text,
    f.parameter AS worst_parameter,
    ROUND(f.rolling_avg::numeric, 2) AS worst_value,
    CASE f.status
      WHEN 'DANGER' THEN 3
      WHEN 'WARNING' THEN 2
      WHEN 'OK' THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END AS status_severity,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
      ORDER BY
        CASE f.status
          WHEN 'DANGER' THEN 3
          WHEN 'WARNING' THEN 2
          WHEN 'OK' THEN 1
          ELSE 0
        END DESC,
        f.rolling_avg DESC NULLS LAST,
        f.parameter
    ) AS rn
  FROM filtered f
  JOIN latest_ts lt ON f.window_start = lt.ts
)
SELECT
  city,
  window_start,
  window_duration,
  worst_status_text,
  worst_parameter,
  worst_value,
  status_severity
FROM ranked
WHERE rn = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT
  'Paris' AS city,
  NULL::timestamp AS window_start,
  'No data' AS window_duration,
  'NO DATA' AS worst_status_text,
  'No data' AS worst_parameter,
  NULL::numeric AS worst_value,
  0 AS status_severity
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ranked WHERE rn = 1)

panels.title: Paris

panels.description: London latest overall AQ status with worst pollutant.

panels.description: Berlin latest overall AQ status with worst pollutant.

targets.rawSql:
WITH filtered AS (
  SELECT
    city,
    window_start,
    window_duration,
    parameter,
    rolling_avg,
    status
  FROM air_quality_metrics
  WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
    AND city = 'Berlin'
    AND parameter ~* '${parameter:regex}'
    AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
    AND status ~* '${status:regex}'

  SELECT MAX(window_start) AS ts
  FROM filtered

  SELECT

panels.title: Berlin

panels.description: Latest per-city worst AQ status marker with worst pollutant details.

targets.rawSql:
WITH filtered AS (
  SELECT
    city,
    window_start,
    window_duration,
    parameter,
    rolling_avg,
    status,
    CASE status
      WHEN 'DANGER' THEN 3
      WHEN 'WARNING' THEN 2
      WHEN 'OK' THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END AS severity
  FROM air_quality_metrics
  WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
    AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
    AND parameter ~* '${parameter:regex}'
    AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
    AND status ~* '${status:regex}'
), latest AS (
  SELECT city, MAX(window_start) AS window_start
  FROM filtered
  GROUP BY city
), ranked AS (
  SELECT
    f.city,
    f.window_start,
    f.window_duration,
    f.status AS worst_status,
    f.parameter AS worst_parameter,
    ROUND(f.rolling_avg::numeric, 2) AS worst_value,
    f.severity,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
      PARTITION BY f.city
      ORDER BY f.severity DESC, f.rolling_avg DESC NULLS LAST, f.parameter
    ) AS rn
  FROM filtered f
  JOIN latest l
    ON l.city = f.city
   AND l.window_start = f.window_start
)
SELECT
  r.window_start AS "time",
  r.city,
  d.latitude,
  d.longitude,
  r.worst_status,
  r.worst_parameter,
  r.worst_value,
  r.window_duration,
  r.window_start,
  r.severity
FROM ranked r
JOIN city_dim d ON d.city = r.city
WHERE r.rn = 1
ORDER BY r.city

panels.title: City Severity Map

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(window_start, $__interval),
  AVG(rolling_avg) AS value,
  parameter AS metric
FROM air_quality_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
  AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
  AND parameter ~* '${parameter:regex}'
  AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  AND status ~* '${status:regex}'
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: All Pollutants - Rolling Average
panels.description: Rolling average trend by pollutant with pollutant-specific thresholds.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(window_start, $__interval),
  AVG(rolling_avg) AS value,
  CONCAT(city, ' - ', parameter) AS metric
FROM air_quality_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
  AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
  AND parameter ~* '${parameter:regex}'
  AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  AND status ~* '${status:regex}'
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  window_start,
  window_end,
  city,
  parameter,
  ROUND(rolling_avg::numeric, 2) AS rolling_avg,
  status,
  window_duration
FROM air_quality_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
  AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
  AND parameter ~* '${parameter:regex}'
  AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  AND status ~* '${status:regex}'
ORDER BY window_start DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT
  city,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'OK')::double precision AS ok_events,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'WARNING')::double precision AS warning_events,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'DANGER')::double precision AS danger_events
FROM air_quality_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
  AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
  AND parameter ~* '${parameter:regex}'
  AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  AND status ~* '${status:regex}'
GROUP BY city
ORDER BY city

SELECT
  parameter,
  COUNT(*)::double precision AS danger_events
FROM air_quality_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
  AND window_start >= ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - INTERVAL '6 hour')
  AND window_start <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
  AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
  AND parameter ~* '${parameter:regex}'
  AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  AND status = 'DANGER'
  AND status ~* '${status:regex}'
GROUP BY parameter
ORDER BY danger_events DESC
